Toronto Waterproofing Rebates & Incentives

Save money with available Toronto programs:

Up to $3,400

City of Toronto Basement Flooding Protection Subsidy

Installation of flood protection devices including backwater valves, sump pumps

Deadline: Ongoing - first come, first served
Check Eligibility
$1,750 per device

Toronto Water Rebate Program

Backwater valve installation for properties at risk

Deadline: Check city website for current status
Check Eligibility

Our team handles all rebate paperwork for Toronto residents!

Toronto Basement Waterproofing FAQ

1. How much does basement waterproofing cost in Downtown Toronto?

Costs vary based on the solution needed. Interior waterproofing typically ranges from $3,000-$8,000, while exterior systems range from $10,000-$25,000. We provide free inspections and detailed quotes for Downtown Toronto homeowners.

2. How quickly can you respond to emergencies in Downtown Toronto?

We maintain crews throughout Downtown Toronto for rapid response. Our average emergency response time is 60 minutes, with 24/7 availability for urgent water issues.

3. Do you handle permits in Downtown Toronto?

Yes, we handle all necessary permits and inspections required by Downtown Toronto building departments. Our established relationships ensure smooth project approval.
